channel.title: Aqw on Nandixer
channel.description: Recent content in Aqw on Nandixer

item.title: Sarah the Nerfkitten Guide
item.description: Sarah the Nerfkitten is the newest Event Boss created by Yoshino. To get there, /join yoshino. Notable abilities: dodges all avoidable attacks applies a “Nerf” debuff that stacks infinitely and lowers damage. all damage done to Sarah is capped at 10 000 Shaman Shaman or Evolved Shaman can loop Elemental Embrace, negating Sarah’s dodge, allowing the entire 20-player team to damage her. Buffers In a team of 20 people, you should have at least one Legion Revenant, StoneCrusher, Lord of Order, and LightCaster.

item.title: Ultra Tyndarius Guide
item.description: Introduction Tyndarius, the Avatar of Fire at /join ultratyndarius is a good entry-level Ultra and the first one I’d recommend clearing after the three in TimeInn. His Insignias offer Infernal Flame Pyromancer, an armor with a 25% boost to all rewards and 35% to damage. Infernal Flame Khopesh, also from Tyndarius, offerst the best damage boost to Elementals. Clearing Tyndarius also unlocks further endgame content. Worth mentioning that Tyndarius is a daily Ultra, not a weekly one.

item.title: Ultra Malgor Guide
item.description: Introduction Malgor, The First Speaker at /join ultraspeaker is currently the most complicated, but also most rewarding Ultra to beat. His Insignias offer Radiant Goddess of War, the best-in-slot boost armor for all situations. Most players tend to get Dauntless first though, because of how overpowered that enhancement is on some classes. Spoiler: Main Story, Malgor Questline Malgor is called a Speaker, because he speaks. A Speaker is a more evolved form of a Mumbler, one of these:

item.title: Archmage HP Tuner

item.title: Boost Items
item.description: Introduction This article will explain how boosting items work in Adventure Quest Worlds. In particular, we will look into the interaction between the following boosts: XP/CP/Gold/REP boosts Damage to All like NSoD Damage to Races like Polly Roger The All Out stat To find your current boosts, look for the following icons on your stat panel: I will be linking items as examples, but many of them have alternatives and variants.
